scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_FacebookLogin_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Core_FacebookLogin_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="appId" text="${resource:FacebookAppId}" dataType="string" defaultValue="" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Log in to connect Facebook App to Instagram Business account
Facebook App Id unknown. Please contact your administrator.
